channel.title: Post your PC specs!
channel.description:
You can tell a lot about the geek by seeing whats under the hood of his case
lets see the ancient computers you guys are runnin!

item.title: Post your PC specs!
item.dc:creator: @freaky5000 freaky5000
item.description:

Thats what im on at the moment at work lmao, Definition of shit, “IBM”.

item.title: Post your PC specs!
item.dc:creator: @freaky5000 freaky5000
item.description:
@freaky5000 wrote:

Intel Core i7 @ 2.93ghz (Unlocked multiplier) Can Clock upto 4.0ghz - Hyerthreading Technology 8 CPU’s(Threads)
EVGA GeForce 480 GTX 1024mb
8GB Dual memory kit - 1333mhz
Gigabyte Technology Motherboard
1TB - Hard Drive

Thats my new gaming pc which i have behind me.

This one is a basic gaming pc which i’m going to turn into a server.

Intel Core 2 Quad Q9300 @ 2.50ghz
ATI HD Radeon 5700 series
4gb Memory
Asus chip set

Read full topic

item.title: Post your PC specs!
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch, post:31, topic:355316”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=451874.msg3331786#msg3331786 date=1283544597]

Four Quad Core Intel Xeon 4GHz 8x16MB Cache, 1633MHz FSB
32 GB DDR SD RAM (8 x 4GB) (1 Ghz)
Six 300GB 15K rpm SEAGATE SAS 3.5 Hot Swap HD’s w/RAID 5

That’s shit tbh…
[/quote]You’re an idiot. That’s pretty fucking beastly.[/quote]

Sorry, I forgot I had to add a closing sarcasm tag…

Read full topic

item.title: Post your PC specs!
item.dc:creator: @Errorist Errorist
item.description:
@Errorist wrote:

[quote=“xEnt, post:35, topic:355316”]put together a new build today, used parts i had lying around and bought a couple cheap parts from friends.

17" Dell LCD @ 75hz 1280x1024
core 2 duo e6320 oc’d to 2.5ghz
2gb generic ram
8800GT 512mb
some random case i found, including generic psu
abit ip35 mobo

running XP, it’s nice and smooth (cod4, mw2, css, wow etc all run great at max detail in the resolution i stated)

nice portable lan pc[/quote]

Nice, I need to put together something like this to re-encode movies.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your PC specs!
item.dc:creator: @Errorist Errorist
item.description:
@Errorist wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch, post:23, topic:355316”][quote author=Errorist link=topic=451874.msg3318434#msg3318434 date=1282503399]

[quote author=Java Is My Bitch link=topic=451874.msg3318238#msg3318238 date=1282489717]
Mac Mini FTW.
I’ve ordered 8 GB ram to juice it up a bit. But for now these are the specs:
1.83 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo
1GB 667 MHz DDR2 SDRAM
L2 Cache : 2MB
Bus speed: 667 MHz
Graphics Crap:
Card: Intel GMA 950 (Gonna order a new one because intel’s cards suck ass.)
VRAM (Total): 64 MB of Shared System Memory
Monitor:
Brand: LG
Resolution: 1920 x 1080 @ 60 Hz
Pixel Depth: 32-Bit Color
[/quote]I was thinking about getting the new mac mini as an HTPC but ended up getting something cheaper. Do you ever use it as one?
[/quote]Oh yea definitely, I still use it with apple TV, and the remote control that comes with it is beastly. The only problem is that it doesn’t have much HD space, although it clocks great for 1GB RAM.[/quote]Are you running yours with XBMC or Boxee?

Read full topic

item.title: Post your PC specs!
item.dc:creator: @skit skit
item.description:
@skit wrote:

CPU: Intel Core i5 750 @ 3,8ghz goin for 4ghz+ later

Cpu Cooler: Thermalright SI 128 SE

Mobo: Asus Maximus III Formula

GFX CARD: Sapphire Radeon HD 5970 2048MB OC + BFG Geforce 8800GTX 768mb OC2 as Physx Card

RAM: Corsair dominator-gt 4gb 1600mhz

HDD: 2x Intel X25-m 80gb RAID 0 as OS/gaming disks + 1,5TB warez disk

PSU: Corsair HX850W 80+

Monitor: Acer P243W 2ms 1920x1200, shitty monitor

Mouse: Microsoft intellimouse 3.0

Mousepad: Icemat

Read full topic
